clinical_study.brief_title: Moxibustion for Mild and Moderate Ulcerative Colitis
clinical_study.official_title: The Mechanism of Moxibustion in Treating Ulcerative Colitis Based on Metabonomics

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanghai Institute of Acupuncture, Moxibustion and Meridian

clinical_study.source: Shanghai Institute of Acupuncture, Moxibustion and Meridian

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether moxibustion is effective to mild and moderate ulcerative colitis and the effect of moxibustion on metabolism.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Basic Science

secondary_outcome.measure: metabolic profile of intestinal mucosa, urine, plasma and serum

arm_group.description: herb-partitioned moxibustion on bilateral Tianshu (ST25) and Shangjuxu (ST37)
bran-partitioned moxibustion on bilateral Tianshu (ST25) and Shangjuxu (ST37)

intervention.description: Ignited moxa cones are placed upon herbal cake. Herbs are smashed into powder. Every 2.8g medicine powder mix with 3g millet wine and then be pressed into herbal cakes which are 28mm in diameter and 7mm in high with a specific mould. Then the herbal cake with a moxa cone will be fixed on Tianshu and Shangjuxu.

Ignited moxa cones are placed upon bran cake. Every 2.8g bran powder mix with 3g millet wine and then be pressed into bran cakes which are 28mm in diameter and 7mm in high with a specific mould. Then the bran cake with a moxa cone will be fixed on Tianshu and Shangjuxu.
